short_summary: Providing Multiple Resource Categories focusing on TBIPS - TBIPS is a Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) arrangement.
description: IM/TI Delivery Services under the contract #2406A-21-239 fulfilled by Modis for $1,659,292.00 for the period from April 2021 to April 2023.
full_summary:
**TBIPS - Multiple Resource Categories Tender**
**Solicitation Number:** 24062-23-253
**Publication Date:** January 09, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** February 21, 2023, at 14:00:00
**Contracting Authority:** Robert Penwarden
**Email:** [Robert.Penwarden@tbs-sct.gc.ca](mailto:Robert.Penwarden@tbs-sct.gc.ca)
**Phone:** 343-543-6021

The Treasury Board of Canada (TB) invites qualified tenderers to submit a proposal for the provision of multiple resource categories under the Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) Supply Arrangement.

**Delivery Location:** National Capital Region (NCR)
**Delivery Timeframe:** March 13, 2023, to March 12, 2024
**Contract Duration:** March 13, 2023, to March 12, 2024

**Resource Categories:**
The following resource categories are required:

- Resource Category and Level of Expertise (P.1): Change Management Consultant - Level 3
- Resource Category and Level of Expertise (P.7): Project Coordinator - Level 3
- Resource Category and Level of Expertise (P.9): Project Manager - Level 3
- Resource Category and Level of Expertise (P.11): Quality Assurance Specialist - Level 3

**Services:** The services to be provided under this contract will involve the delivery and support of existing and upcoming projects leveraging various technologies. The resources will supplement existing staff to ensure that new and existing IM/IT projects adhere to established project management and delivery processes.

**Evaluation Methodology:** Evaluations will be conducted with fairness in accordance with the evaluation criteria and selection methodology defined in the Request for Proposal (RFP).

**Security Requirement:** The Common PS SRCL #34 applies. The minimum corporate security required is Secret, and the minimum proposed resources security required is Secret.

**Trade Agreements:** This procurement is subject to the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), the Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), and other trade agreements.

**RFP Documents:** RFP documents will be e-mailed directly from the Contracting Authority to the qualified supply arrangement holders who are being invited to bid on this requirement. "Buyandsell.gc.ca" is not responsible for the distribution of solicitation documents.

Download the RFP and attachments from the following links
